background: Mrs. Watson is looking to invest her budget in the real-estate market focusing on two types of properties: condos and detached houses, with specific profits and minimum investment requirements for each.
constraints: The total investment in both condos and detached houses must be at most TotalBudget
The investment in condos must be at least MinPercentCondo of the total investment
The investment in detached houses must be at least MinInvestHouse
The investment in condos must be non-negative
The investment in detached houses must be non-negative
objective: Maximize the total profit earned from investments in condos and detached houses
description: Mrs. Watson wants to invest in the real-estate market and has a total budget of at most \var{TotalBudget}. She has two choices which include condos and detached houses. Each dollar invested in condos yields a \var{ProfitCondo} profit and each dollar invested in detached houses yields a \var{ProfitHouse} profit. A minimum of \var{MinPercentCondo} of all money invested must be in condos, and at least \var{MinInvestHouse} must be in detached houses. Formulate an LP that can be used to maximize total profit earned from Mrs. Watson's investment.

parameters.definition: Profit yield per dollar invested in condos
Profit yield per dollar invested in detached houses
Minimum percentage of total investment that must be in condos
